title: Self Discovery Exercises
introText: Self-discovery isn't about fixing yourselfâ€”it's about understanding where your pain came from, so you stop confusing it for your identity. The more you uncover and untangle, the more room you make for truth, compassion, and change.

exercises.title: Origins
exercises.description: Explore unhelpful patterns, understand where limiting beliefs originated, and practice self-compassion to create space for change and growth.

bePatientCard.title: Be Patient With Yourself
bePatientCard.description: The more you patiently practice identifying emotions, the better you'll become at understanding and managing them with compassion.
